name: The Orb Chambers II
description: WARNING: THIS GAME REQUIRES SKILL. The Orb Chambers 2 is a brutally hard physics puzzle plat-former expanding on the original to make it better in every way possible. The game now includes MUCH more content, improved graphics and plenty of new features!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 / Vista 32 bit Processor: Duel core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 240 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: standard sound port Additional Notes: Laptops and low end cards will need to play without the lighting engine.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 - 64 bit Processor: I5 Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: standard sound port

reviews.review_text: Achievement Speed:  They come in pretty regularly. I got 5 achievements just by doing the first stage, and exploring around a bit. Almost like candy!  Solid puzzle game. Can get frustrating at times.
